entry.title: Fairness in AI
entry.content:
I developed an app together with Maxime Dulieu to assess the fairness of an algorithm.

Check it out at http://www.ethics-mathematica.com/, or on Github at https://github.com/mathematica-mpr/sampler/.
entry.summary: I developed an app together with Maxime Dulieu to assess the fairness of an algorithm.

entry.title: Welcome to Jekyll!
entry.content:
Welcome to my site!

This site has two purposes: it is a repository of things I learned or did that I would like to remember, and it is a way for me to track progress on my current projects.
